checkout.guarantee_desc: If you don't like it, we'll refund your money. No questions asked.

checkout.free_plan_note: This plan is free and does not require a credit card.

addons.accountant_desc: Hire a certified accountant to handle all your monthly tax returns and answer your questions.
addons.accountant_details:
Have a dedicated accountant for your company. Includes:
• Monthly returns (DAS, etc.)
• Unlimited Q&A via WhatsApp
• Continuous tax regularization
• Ideal for those billing over R$ 5k/month.
addons.ir_desc: Simplified annual income tax declaration service for content creators.
addons.ir_details:
Avoid tax audits with our specialized declaration for creators.
• Cash flow analysis
• Foreign Earnings Declaration (Adsense/Youtube)
• Retroactive Carnê-Leão (if needed)
• Complete submission to the IRS.
addons.audit_desc: A unique, in-depth analysis of your finances with a personalized growth plan.
addons.audit_details:
Complete diagnosis of your financial health.
• Expense and waste analysis
• Tax optimization (pay less taxes legally)
• Action plan to double your profits
• 1-hour meeting with an expert.

integrations.nubank_desc: Sync your expenses and credit card bills automatically.
integrations.hotmart_desc: Import your digital product sales in real-time.
